Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

Pre-1900 MIDs: MID2043 MID1525

MID2005

TERRMID: MID2005 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2005 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2005 1 -- third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2005 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2005 Bolivia and Brazil asked the US to intervene in their Acre dispute. The US refused, but indicated that it would intervene on Brazilâ€™s side if necessary to protect US interests in coffee beans (Gibler 2018).
